title: could a senior give me some info about the summer courses after the 4th semester
content:
1. how long is the course, and when is it usually?

2. by what margin does your cgpa increase (assuming you get an S grade) and does this grade get added to your transcripts immediately?

3. what were the topics offered last year?

comments.body: They are usually a week long. Idts there is an option to do it online. They are 2 credit courses so u can calculate the increase in cgpa accordingly and they don't get added to ur current semester's sgpa
Did u get any message regarding it? On how to apply?
No, it will be sent to us after the end of this sem
Thanks a lot. does it get added to your overall CGPA right away? asking because i heard that even if u do an internship after 4th sem, the internship credits only get added in the final year.
So will it be added to my cgpa in the final year along with internship credits?
Dont know the exact rules but the summer course i did between 4th and 5th sem got attached to my 5th sem sgpa on my marks card .
